search.name: Including resources
search.description: Asks the server to include referenced resources from those in the main query. Uses the defined search parameters

search.name: Find resources referring to this one
search.description: Reverse include. Asks the server to include resources of a given type that reference this one. Uses the defined search parameters

search.name: Chaining
search.description: Specifying a search by including parameters in references resources (using defined search parameters)
